name: DeatHocki
description:
Created for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018, this game pits 2 players against each other with a best of five air hockey match. In this game there are no goals, the objective is to ram the puck into the other player at high speeds.

You can either play single player against an AI or in local multiplayer with a buddy. 

Windows build has been provided below. Have Fun!
